name: queryLegalHold
description: Get summary for snapshots under legal hold. If object_id is passed, return summary information only for snapshots of the object under legal hold else return summary for all snapshots under legal hold.

object_id.description: Limit the list to snapshot for the particular object.

limit.description: Limit the number of matches returned.

offset.description: An integer that specifies a number of initial matches to ignore.

object_name.description: Limits the list to objects that match a specified value for the object name.

object_type.description: Limits the list to objects that match a specified type.

before_date.description: Limits the list to snapshots with holds created before a specified date.

after_date.description: Limits the list to snapshots with holds created after a specified date.

placed_on_hold_before_date.description: Limits the list to snapshots which were placed on legal hold before a specified date.

placed_on_hold_after_date.description: Limits the list to snapshots which were placed on legal hold after a specified date.

sort_by.description: The attribute used to sort summary information. The optional parameter **_sort_order_** specifies ascending or descending sort order.

sort_order.description: Specifies ascending or descending sort order. Summary results are sorted in ascending order when this parameter is not specified.

snapshot_type.description: Specifies the type of snapshots to be returned.
